conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true isometric/cutaway 3D scene with extruded walls, visible thickness, and an elevated angled viewpoint exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; clean cutaway overall. Minor issues: some openings/corners feel simplified and not fully precise to plan.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall massing resembles the plan (central hall with multiple rooms, bedrooms on right), but several plan-specific zones are unclear or altered: balcony area is not clearly represented, bath/WC layout is not clearly identifiable, and some partitions/room proportions appear shifted or simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Beds and general furniture are present and mostly plausible by room; however bathroom fixtures (tub/toilet/vanity) from the plan are not clearly present, and some cabinetry appears where the 2D plan indicates robes/linen instead.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean, with good visibility and materials; openings and room boundaries are mostly readable. Minor clarity loss due to stylized simplification of doors/openings and some ambiguous room labeling via furniture.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity issues: balcony and bath/WC areas are not clearly or accurately represented relative to the 2D plan, and some internal partitions/proportions appear altered.
Door/opening placement and sizing appear simplified; several plan door swings/openings are not faithfully reproduced.
Bathroom fixtures expected from the plan (tub/toilet/vanity) are not clearly present/located in the 3D render.

summary: A valid 3D cutaway with strong 3D fundamentals, but only moderate geometric fidelity to the 2D plan due to unclear/mismatched balcony and bath/WC areas and simplified openings/furnishing.
